name: Planet Mayhem
description:
For proper view in browser on FHD monitor open it with fullscreen and some browsers dont support WebGl so if you are not seeing textures right try chrome or Edge. If Even this doesnt work for you download desktop application.

 

This game is about flying with spaceships between planets and mining resourses. You should be quick or your enemys will kill you!! 

  • More information is in game more specifically in controls 
  • Theme for this GameJam was "A little planet"

Contributors: 

  • Martin Jeřábek 
  • Vladimir Voršilka
  • Adam Máka 
  • Jan Adam
  • Tomáš Procházka 

Enjoy and have fun with our little game <3
